p: (E1-Basic Needs): Budget allocations for the basic-needs interpretation utilize results by Rao and Min54 and Kikstra et al.55 on the energy requirements to meet basic needs and attain decent living standards. The work of Kikstra et al. provides estimates of country-explicit energy requirements to achieve sufficient nutrition, housing, and transportation to meet established standards of living. We utilize these estimates to allocate a portion of the EU effort-sharing budget as a priority measure to be used in meeting basic needs thresholds for the portion of the population most at risk of poverty.
